snippet: Officers shot and killed a woman carrying a rifle, two hand grenades and a handgun near Istanbul’s main police station.
abstract: Turkish police intervene in attacks at Istanbul's central police station and government offices; violence continues streak begun by leftist group Revolutionary People's Liberation Party-Front.
lead_paragraph: Officers shot and killed a woman carrying a rifle, two hand grenades and a handgun near Istanbul’s main police station.

headline.main: Turkish Police Foil Attack on Police Station
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Turkey: Armed Woman Killed by Police in Istanbul Shootout
